lead_paragraph: SIEGEL--Jerome A. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Jerome A. Siegel. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen, President The Harmonie Club 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SIEGEL, JEROME A

snippet: SIEGEL--Jerome A. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Jerome A. Siegel. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen, President The Harmonie Club 1/3
